title: pentax logo?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/files/406646012_50d8f81014_5277.jpg)

anybody know what this is please?

thanks!
author: peter jarvis

comments.content: heres a link to an eps version of this logo [http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/catalogue/P/2730.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070312015848/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/catalogue/P/2730.html)

[Eurostile Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20070312015848/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=10&displayfontid=LH.107947.0.0&fontRendererText=PENTAX) is pretty close, but it isn’t condensed enough and the Condensed is too condensed…

[Stainless Cond Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20070312015848/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/stainless/cond-black/) is also similar.

(But it’s almost certainly custom.)
